OOC: No offense, but I'd prefer something less copied. Geotrons? 
Wilds?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., dewboy30816@y... wrote:
> OOC: Thanks, but if we do form a new facton what should we call it? 
> Since I first posted it I've come to the conclusion that "Carnitrons 
> is stupid.  Maybe "Automals" or "Maxibots" whatta you think?
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., wingedwarrior41@h... wrote:
> > OOC: I have to admit... Nice going with mutate!!!
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., dewboy30816@y... wrote:
> > > OOC: Did I say Ravage again I meant Rampage.
> > > 
> > > Rhesus detects a frequency, but doesn't know whose it is.  It 
> seems

> to

> > >

> > >

> > >

> > > 
> > > Rhesus: Yes I'm a friend.
> > > 
> > > Rhesus guesses that Transmutates spark never fully went on line 
so 
> > he

> him 
> > > out of it.

> > >

> > > Rhesus: (perfect now he's revising the words of others) Well I'm 
> > sure 
> > > he was wrong. What faction are you in.

> > > Mutate: Well, I was a Maximal Protoform, but I don't approve of 
> > > fighting. In fact I jumped in the...hey....I'm not dumb anymore.

> need

couldn't

one

the

running

close
